name: Dragon and IncredibleAdventure
description:
Dragon and Incredible Adventure, the best hot-blooded combat game ever, is now open for beta test to players around the world! Don’t miss this exciting and thrilling anime-derivative!

Recruit, select and train the best martial artists to make your own powerful team. Lead your team to a wonderful adventure. Achieve the tournament championship to amaze the world. Collect the scattered “Balls” and summon Kami to realize your dream!

Kamehameha! Heroic martial artists! It’s time for you to light up the battlefield!

Features
=================================
◆Dragon and Incredible Adventure◆ A massive collection of martial artists
·Up to 200 martial artists to surprise you
·Train different types of martial artists to improve your team power
·Put close martial artists together to trigger the hidden plots and get surprising rewards

◆Dragon and Incredible Adventure◆ Strategic battles
·Adjust your strategies to handle enemies with different skills
·Upgrade your martial artists to gain advantages in the battles
·Excavate your brain power to have each battle in control

◆Dragon and Incredible Adventure◆ World raids
·The Demon Lord will show up regularly on the world
·Team up with players worldwide to protect the Earth together
·Make more friends when the Raid is over to make your future gaming merrier

◆Dragon and Incredible Adventure◆ Fight for the Championship of the World
·You can join the Martial Arts Tournament anytime
·Dispatch your strongest martial artists and win
·Get powerful game items

◆Dragon and Incredible Adventure◆ A full plotline and countless fun
·Vividly bring you back to the original story, making you lost in the scene
·Various play modes to fill and jazz up your leisure time
·Show your powerful martial artists to friends and invite them to play together

Support: db-cs@gfunfun.com
